video_title: From Zero to Millions: Danny Postma Reveals AI App Strategies for Success

content_profile.title: From Zero to Millions: Danny Postma Reveals AI App Strategies for Success

key_takeaways: Solution: Switch from automatic most-upvoted to curated selection from top upvoted (Difficulty: intermediate)
Solution: Maintain consistent content moderation across AI model changes (Difficulty: advanced)
Growth Tactic: Create novel AI products that attract media attention (Channel: viral)
Growth Tactic: Focus on SEO as primary marketing channel (Channel: seo)
